name: Night of the Pumpkin Head
description:
You wake up in your house, but something is weird.
The lights are off and you have a strange feeling.  Someone is fooling you...
 Solve his riddles and try to run from his madness.
But watch out, the time ain't much... ___________________________

Please read the instructions below!

A Game by

Alessandro "drom1x" Ampala
Alessandro "Bazisti" Pegoraro
Matteo "Crimson Chinotto" Rubino

Purpose

This game is a submission for One Minute Game Jam #8
Theme: Pumpkins

Description

The game is a loop game inspired by masterpieces like Outer Wilds, The Forgotten City and other titles that use the loop mechanic.

The gameplay lasts approximately 1 minute, but you will need more loop cycles to finish it.

Don't Give Up!!!

Controls

WASD: Movement
Right Mouse: Focus light
E: Interact
ESC: Quit

Disclaimers

THIS IS NOT A HORROR GAME, just a creepy one.
There are no Jumpscares.
